article_title: Man charged in Friday night police chase
article_text:
Police responded to a shots fired call Friday night at Thurston Road near Brooks Avenue. They say they tried to pull over a car driven by Lucas, but he took off and led them on a chase.

It ended several miles away on Vienna Street; no one was hurt.

article_metadata.description: Rochester police made an arrest after a man ran from officers in his vehicle...

og.description: Rochester police made an arrest after a man ran from officers in his vehicle...
